bibl.note: Surveys literary and papyrological evidence attesting the use of comic texts as functional to the development of interpretative skills since the level of the school of the grammaticus. In the Institutio oratoria Quintilian expresses a marked preference for Menander, whose ethopoiia he praises. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Francesca Romana Nocchi, Lettura di Menandro alla scuola del grammaticus.

Surveys literary and papyrological evidence attesting the use of comic texts as functional to the development of interpretative skills since the level of the school of the grammaticus. In the Institutio oratoria Quintilian expresses a marked preference for Menander, whose ethopoiia he praises. - Avec résumé en anglais.
